articles.title: The hard-to-find PS5 and RTX 3090 have each inspired daring heists - The Verge
articles.description: The PS5 and the Nvidia Geforce RTX 3090 have become notoriously expensive in the resale market, but that hasn’t stopped people from finding other methods of obtaining both products. RTX 3090s were stolen from MSI, PS5s were taken out of the back of a moving t…
articles.content:
Its one way to get something before it sells out
